parameter.name: ids
parameter.description: Integer. Comma separated list of one or more user ids to filter on.

parameter.name: userNames
parameter.description: String. Comma separated list of one or more usernames to filter on.

parameter.name: firstName
parameter.description: String. First name to filter on. * will be interpreted as a wild card. Starts matching from the beginning of the string.

parameter.name: lastName
parameter.description: String. Last name to filter on. * will be interpreted as a wild card. Starts matching from the beginning of the string.

parameter.name: modifiedBefore
parameter.description: String (ISO8601 format). Only users modified before this date/time will be returned.

parameter.name: modifiedSince
parameter.description: String (ISO8601 format). Only users modified since this date/time will be returned.

parameter.name: perPage
parameter.description: Integer. Represents how many results to retrieve per request (page). Default is 50. Max is 50.

parameter.name: page
parameter.description: Integer. Represents the page of results to retrieve.
